verses.roman:
eta bali' tāṅra ṭhāñi ei ājñā lañā
dakṣiṇe calilā prabhu haraṣita hañā

synonyms: eta bali'-saying this; tāṅra ṭhāñi—from him; ei ājñā lañā—taking permission; dakṣiṇe calilā—departed for southern India; prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; haraṣita hañā—being very much pleased.
translation: After talking in this way with Paramānanda Purī, the Lord took his permission to leave and, very much pleased, departed for southern India.
